text: Raphaël Lakafia (born 28 October 1988) is a French rugby union player. He currently plays for and plays at the Number 8 position. He is the younger brother of Pierre-Gilles Lakafia and son of former French javelin champion Jean-Paul Lakafia. Lakafia played for France in the 2008 IRB Junior World Championship and scored three tries against Japan. He played at the 2011 Rugby World Cup for France. He played twice during the tournament against Japan and Tonga. ==References== ==External links== *Rugbyrama.fr Profile * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:FC Grenoble players Category:Biarritz Olympique players Category:Stade Français rugby players Category:French rugby union players Category:Rugby union number eights Category:Rugby union players from Wallis and Futuna Category:French people of Wallis and Futuna descent Category:France international rugby union players
title: Raphaël Lakafia
